src_original: śāntaṃ śuddhaṃ nirābhāsaṃ vittiḥ prajñeti kīrttitā ||5 ||  praveśaśca bhavedasya vidhyaṣṭamanasāṃ tataḥ |
na satyaṃ na mṛṣākāraṃ ātmānaṃ madhyayoginaḥ ||8 ||
svādhiṣṭhānapadaṃ jñātuṃ ye śaktāḥ tattvato nahi |
prajñā citraṃ vipākaśca vimarddaśca vilakṣaṇam |  asyāstattvamato viddhi yenāsi jagato vibhuḥ ||1 ||
vāsanaiva viśuddhā cet sarvvatraiva tu sā tathā ||10 ||
